Python Code python
import os import json from datetime import datetime from ddgs import DDGS import time # First, let's inspect workspace to see if there are any existing files from previous research print("Inspecting workspace for existing MLB managerial change research files...") print("=" * 70) workspace_files = [] if os.path.exists('workspace'): # Fixed: Use consistent variable naming throughout for file in os.listdir('workspace'): if any(term in file.lower() for term in ['mlb', 'manager', 'baseball', 'july', '2010', 'tigers']): workspace_files.append(file) print(f"Found existing file: {file}") else: os.makedirs('workspace') print("Created workspace directory") if workspace_files: print(f"\nFound {len(workspace_files)} existing files related to MLB managerial research") # Inspect the structure of the most recent file latest_file = max(workspace_files, key=lambda x: os.path.getmtime(f'workspace/{x}')) print(f"\nInspecting structure of most recent file: {latest_file}") print("-" * 50) try: with open(f'workspace/{latest_file}', 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f: if latest_file.endswith('.json'): data = json.load(f) print(f"JSON file structure:") for key in data.keys(): print(f" - {key}: {type(data[key])}") if isinstance(data[key], list) and len(data[key]) > 0: print(f" Sample item: {type(data[key][0])}") elif isinstance(data[key], dict) and len(data[key]) > 0: print(f" Keys: {list(data[key].keys())[:3]}...") else: content = f.read() print(f"Text file preview (first 200 chars):") print(content[:200] + "..." if len(content) > 200 else content) except Exception as e: print(f"Error inspecting file: {e}") else: print("No existing MLB managerial research files found") print("\n" + "=" * 70) print("STARTING COMPREHENSIVE MLB JULY 2010 MANAGERIAL CHANGES SEARCH") print("=" * 70) # Define targeted search queries for MLB managerial changes in July 2010 search_queries = [ 'MLB manager dismissed July 2010', 'baseball manager fired July 2010', 'MLB manager interim appointment July 2010', 'July 2010 MLB coaching changes', 'MLB managerial changes summer 2010', 'Detroit Tigers alumni managers MLB history', 'baseball manager temporary appointment July 2010', 'MLB acting manager July 2010', 'baseball coaching staff changes July 2010', 'MLB manager replacement July 2010' ] print(f"Executing {len(search_queries)} targeted searches for MLB managerial changes...") print(f"Focus: July 2010 MLB managerial dismissals, interim appointments, Detroit Tigers alumni") # Initialize search results storage all_search_results = [] search_summary = { 'search_timestamp': datetime.now().isoformat(), 'search_focus': 'MLB managerial changes July 2010 with Detroit Tigers alumni focus', 'total_queries': len(search_queries), 'successful_searches': 0, 'failed_searches': 0, 'queries_executed': search_queries } # Execute searches with error handling and delays searcher = DDGS(timeout=15) for i, query in enumerate(search_queries, 1): print(f"\nSearch {i}/{len(search_queries)}: {query}") print("-" * 60) try: # Execute search with fallback backends results = searcher.text( query, max_results=8, page=1, backend=["google", "duckduckgo", "bing", "yahoo"], safesearch="off", region="en-us" ) if results and len(results) > 0: print(f"✅ Found {len(results)} results for search {i}") search_summary['successful_searches'] += 1 # Process and display results for j, result in enumerate(results, 1): title = result.get('title', 'No title') href = result.get('href', 'No link') body = result.get('body', 'No description') print(f"\nResult {j}:") print(f"Title: {title}") print(f"Link: {href}") print(f"Description: {body}") # Store result with search context result_entry = { 'search_number': i, 'query_text': query, 'result_number': j, 'title': title, 'link': href, 'description': body } all_search_results.append(result_entry) # Analyze for key indicators combined_text = f"{title.lower()} {body.lower()}" # Check for July 2010 relevance july_2010_indicators = ['july 2010', '2010', 'summer 2010'] manager_indicators = ['manager', 'coach', 'fired', 'dismissed', 'interim', 'acting', 'appointed', 'replaced'] tigers_indicators = ['tigers', 'detroit', 'comerica'] july_matches = [term for term in july_2010_indicators if term in combined_text] manager_matches = [term for term in manager_indicators if term in combined_text] tigers_matches = [term for term in tigers_indicators if term in combined_text] if july_matches and manager_matches: print(f"🎯 HIGHLY RELEVANT - July 2010 + Manager: {', '.join(july_matches + manager_matches)}") if tigers_matches: print(f"🐅 TIGERS CONNECTION: {', '.join(tigers_matches)}") # Look for specific manager names potential_managers = ['leyland', 'gardenhire', 'maddon', 'francona', 'torre', 'manuel', 'washington', 'wedge'] mentioned_managers = [name for name in potential_managers if name in combined_text] if mentioned_managers: print(f"👤 MANAGER MENTIONS: {', '.join(mentioned_managers)}") print("-" * 40) else: print(f"⚠️ No results found for search {i}: '{query}'") search_summary['failed_searches'] += 1 # Add empty result entry all_search_results.append({ 'search_number': i, 'query_text': query, 'result_number': 0, 'title': 'No results', 'link': 'N/A', 'description': 'No results found for this query' }) except Exception as e: print(f"❌ Error during search {i}: {str(e)}") search_summary['failed_searches'] += 1 # Add error result entry all_search_results.append({ 'search_number': i, 'query_text': query, 'result_number': 0, 'title': 'Search error', 'link': 'N/A', 'description': f'Search failed with error: {str(e)}' }) # Add delay between searches to avoid rate limiting if i < len(search_queries): print(f"\n⏳ Waiting 2 seconds before next search...") time.sleep(2) print("\n" + "=" * 70) # Update search summary search_summary['total_results'] = len(all_search_results) search_summary['all_search_results'] = all_search_results # Save comprehensive search results timestamp = datetime.now().strftime("%Y%m%d_%H%M%S") results_file = f"workspace/mlb_july_2010_managerial_changes_search_{timestamp}.json" with open(results_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump(search_summary, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f"\n📊 COMPREHENSIVE SEARCH SUMMARY:") print(f"Total targeted queries executed: {search_summary['total_queries']}") print(f"Successful searches: {search_summary['successful_searches']}") print(f"Failed searches: {search_summary['failed_searches']}") print(f"Total results collected: {search_summary['total_results']}") print(f"Search results saved to: {results_file}") # Analyze results for specific findings print("\n🔍 ANALYZING RESULTS FOR MLB JULY 2010 MANAGERIAL CHANGES:") print("=" * 60) # Categorize results by relevance july_2010_results = [] manager_change_results = [] tigers_related_results = [] interim_results = [] for result in all_search_results: if result['title'] in ['No results', 'Search error']: continue title_lower = result['title'].lower() desc_lower = result['description'].lower() combined = f"{title_lower} {desc_lower}" # Categorize by relevance if any(term in combined for term in ['july 2010', '2010']): july_2010_results.append(result) if any(term in combined for term in ['manager', 'fired', 'dismissed', 'appointed', 'replaced']): manager_change_results.append(result) if any(term in combined for term in ['tigers', 'detroit']): tigers_related_results.append(result) if any(term in combined for term in ['interim', 'acting', 'temporary']): interim_results.append(result) print(f"\n📋 CATEGORIZED RESULTS:") print(f"July 2010 mentions: {len(july_2010_results)}") print(f"Manager change mentions: {len(manager_change_results)}") print(f"Tigers-related mentions: {len(tigers_related_results)}") print(f"Interim/Acting manager mentions: {len(interim_results)}") # Display most relevant findings if july_2010_results: print(f"\n🎯 JULY 2010 RELEVANT RESULTS:") for i, result in enumerate(july_2010_results[:5], 1): print(f"\n{i}. {result['title']}") print(f" Query: {result['query_text']}") print(f" Link: {result['link']}") print(f" Description: {result['description'][:150]}...") if interim_results: print(f"\n🔄 INTERIM/ACTING MANAGER RESULTS:") for i, result in enumerate(interim_results[:3], 1): print(f"\n{i}. {result['title']}") print(f" Query: {result['query_text']}") print(f" Description: {result['description'][:150]}...") if tigers_related_results: print(f"\n🐅 DETROIT TIGERS RELATED RESULTS:") for i, result in enumerate(tigers_related_results[:3], 1): print(f"\n{i}. {result['title']}") print(f" Description: {result['description'][:150]}...") # Create analysis summary analysis_file = f'workspace/mlb_july_2010_analysis_summary_{timestamp}.txt' with open(analysis_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: f.write("MLB JULY 2010 MANAGERIAL CHANGES - COMPREHENSIVE SEARCH ANALYSIS\n") f.write("=" * 65 + "\n\n") f.write(f"Analysis Date: {datetime.now().strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')}\n") f.write(f"Total Search Queries: {search_summary['total_queries']}\n") f.write(f"Successful Searches: {search_summary['successful_searches']}\n") f.write(f"Failed Searches: {search_summary['failed_searches']}\n") f.write(f"Total Search Results: {search_summary['total_results']}\n\n") f.write("SEARCH OBJECTIVES STATUS:\n") f.write("-" * 25 + "\n") f.write(f"1. July 2010 MLB managerial changes: {len(july_2010_results)} relevant results\n") f.write(f"2. Manager dismissals/appointments: {len(manager_change_results)} relevant results\n") f.write(f"3. Interim/Acting appointments: {len(interim_results)} relevant results\n") f.write(f"4. Detroit Tigers connections: {len(tigers_related_results)} relevant results\n\n") if july_2010_results: f.write("TOP JULY 2010 FINDINGS:\n") f.write("-" * 25 + "\n") for i, result in enumerate(july_2010_results[:5], 1): f.write(f"{i}. {result['title']}\n") f.write(f" Query: {result['query_text']}\n") f.write(f" Link: {result['link']}\n\n") if interim_results: f.write("INTERIM/ACTING MANAGER FINDINGS:\n") f.write("-" * 35 + "\n") for i, result in enumerate(interim_results[:3], 1): f.write(f"{i}. {result['title']}\n") f.write(f" Description: {result['description'][:100]}...\n\n") print(f"\n📁 Analysis complete. Files saved:") print(f"Search results: {results_file}") print(f"Analysis summary: {analysis_file}") print(f"\n🎯 PRELIMINARY ASSESSMENT:") print(f"=" * 30) if search_summary['successful_searches'] > 0: print(f"✅ Successfully completed {search_summary['successful_searches']} out of {search_summary['total_queries']} searches") print(f"📊 Collected {search_summary['total_results']} total search results") if july_2010_results: print(f"🎯 Found {len(july_2010_results)} results specifically mentioning July 2010") if interim_results: print(f"🔄 Found {len(interim_results)} results about interim/acting managers") if tigers_related_results: print(f"🐅 Found {len(tigers_related_results)} results related to Detroit Tigers") print(f"\n📋 Next step: Detailed analysis of results to identify specific managerial changes") else: print(f"❌ No successful searches completed - may need alternative search approach") print(f"\n🏁 Comprehensive search phase complete - ready for detailed analysis!")

Python Code python
import os import json from datetime import datetime from ddgs import DDGS import time # First, let's inspect workspace to see if there are any existing files from previous research print("Inspecting workspace for existing MLB managerial change research files...") print("=" * 70) workspace_files = [] if os.path.exists('workspace'): # Fixed: Properly define and use consistent variable naming files_list = os.listdir('workspace') for file in files_list: if any(term in file.lower() for term in ['mlb', 'manager', 'baseball', 'july', '2010', 'tigers']): workspace_files.append(file) print(f"Found existing file: {file}") else: os.makedirs('workspace') print("Created workspace directory") if workspace_files: print(f"\nFound {len(workspace_files)} existing files related to MLB managerial research") # Inspect the structure of the most recent file latest_file = max(workspace_files, key=lambda x: os.path.getmtime(f'workspace/{x}')) print(f"\nInspecting structure of most recent file: {latest_file}") print("-" * 50) try: with open(f'workspace/{latest_file}', 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f: if latest_file.endswith('.json'): data = json.load(f) print(f"JSON file structure:") for key in data.keys(): print(f" - {key}: {type(data[key])}") if isinstance(data[key], list) and len(data[key]) > 0: print(f" Sample item: {type(data[key][0])}") elif isinstance(data[key], dict) and len(data[key]) > 0: print(f" Keys: {list(data[key].keys())[:3]}...") else: content = f.read() print(f"Text file preview (first 200 chars):") print(content[:200] + "..." if len(content) > 200 else content) except Exception as e: print(f"Error inspecting file: {e}") else: print("No existing MLB managerial research files found") print("\n" + "=" * 70) print("STARTING COMPREHENSIVE MLB JULY 2010 MANAGERIAL CHANGES SEARCH") print("=" * 70) # Define targeted search queries for MLB managerial changes in July 2010 search_queries = [ 'MLB manager dismissed July 2010', 'baseball manager fired July 2010', 'MLB manager interim appointment July 2010', 'July 2010 MLB coaching changes', 'MLB managerial changes summer 2010', 'Detroit Tigers alumni managers MLB history', 'baseball manager temporary appointment July 2010', 'MLB acting manager July 2010', 'baseball coaching staff changes July 2010', 'MLB manager replacement July 2010' ] print(f"Executing {len(search_queries)} targeted searches for MLB managerial changes...") print(f"Focus: July 2010 MLB managerial dismissals, interim appointments, Detroit Tigers alumni") # Initialize search results storage all_search_results = [] search_summary = { 'search_timestamp': datetime.now().isoformat(), 'search_focus': 'MLB managerial changes July 2010 with Detroit Tigers alumni focus', 'total_queries': len(search_queries), 'successful_searches': 0, 'failed_searches': 0, 'queries_executed': search_queries } # Execute searches with error handling and delays searcher = DDGS(timeout=15) for i, query in enumerate(search_queries, 1): print(f"\nSearch {i}/{len(search_queries)}: {query}") print("-" * 60) try: # Execute search with fallback backends results = searcher.text( query, max_results=8, page=1, backend=["google", "duckduckgo", "bing", "yahoo"], safesearch="off", region="en-us" ) if results and len(results) > 0: print(f"✅ Found {len(results)} results for search {i}") search_summary['successful_searches'] += 1 # Process and display results for j, result in enumerate(results, 1): title = result.get('title', 'No title') href = result.get('href', 'No link') body = result.get('body', 'No description') print(f"\nResult {j}:") print(f"Title: {title}") print(f"Link: {href}") print(f"Description: {body}") # Store result with search context result_entry = { 'search_number': i, 'query_text': query, 'result_number': j, 'title': title, 'link': href, 'description': body } all_search_results.append(result_entry) # Analyze for key indicators combined_text = f"{title.lower()} {body.lower()}" # Check for July 2010 relevance july_2010_indicators = ['july 2010', '2010', 'summer 2010'] manager_indicators = ['manager', 'coach', 'fired', 'dismissed', 'interim', 'acting', 'appointed', 'replaced'] tigers_indicators = ['tigers', 'detroit', 'comerica'] july_matches = [term for term in july_2010_indicators if term in combined_text] manager_matches = [term for term in manager_indicators if term in combined_text] tigers_matches = [term for term in tigers_indicators if term in combined_text] if july_matches and manager_matches: print(f"🎯 HIGHLY RELEVANT - July 2010 + Manager: {', '.join(july_matches + manager_matches)}") if tigers_matches: print(f"🐅 TIGERS CONNECTION: {', '.join(tigers_matches)}") # Look for specific manager names potential_managers = ['leyland', 'gardenhire', 'maddon', 'francona', 'torre', 'manuel', 'washington', 'wedge'] mentioned_managers = [name for name in potential_managers if name in combined_text] if mentioned_managers: print(f"👤 MANAGER MENTIONS: {', '.join(mentioned_managers)}") print("-" * 40) else: print(f"⚠️ No results found for search {i}: '{query}'") search_summary['failed_searches'] += 1 # Add empty result entry all_search_results.append({ 'search_number': i, 'query_text': query, 'result_number': 0, 'title': 'No results', 'link': 'N/A', 'description': 'No results found for this query' }) except Exception as e: print(f"❌ Error during search {i}: {str(e)}") search_summary['failed_searches'] += 1 # Add error result entry all_search_results.append({ 'search_number': i, 'query_text': query, 'result_number': 0, 'title': 'Search error', 'link': 'N/A', 'description': f'Search failed with error: {str(e)}' }) # Add delay between searches to avoid rate limiting if i < len(search_queries): print(f"\n⏳ Waiting 2 seconds before next search...") time.sleep(2) print("\n" + "=" * 70) # Update search summary search_summary['total_results'] = len(all_search_results) search_summary['all_search_results'] = all_search_results # Save comprehensive search results timestamp = datetime.now().strftime("%Y%m%d_%H%M%S") results_file = f"workspace/mlb_july_2010_managerial_changes_search_{timestamp}.json" with open(results_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump(search_summary, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f"\n📊 COMPREHENSIVE SEARCH SUMMARY:") print(f"Total targeted queries executed: {search_summary['total_queries']}") print(f"Successful searches: {search_summary['successful_searches']}") print(f"Failed searches: {search_summary['failed_searches']}") print(f"Total results collected: {search_summary['total_results']}") print(f"Search results saved to: {results_file}") # Analyze results for specific findings print("\n🔍 ANALYZING RESULTS FOR MLB JULY 2010 MANAGERIAL CHANGES:") print("=" * 60) # Categorize results by relevance july_2010_results = [] manager_change_results = [] tigers_related_results = [] interim_results = [] for result in all_search_results: if result['title'] in ['No results', 'Search error']: continue title_lower = result['title'].lower() desc_lower = result['description'].lower() combined = f"{title_lower} {desc_lower}" # Categorize by relevance if any(term in combined for term in ['july 2010', '2010']): july_2010_results.append(result) if any(term in combined for term in ['manager', 'fired', 'dismissed', 'appointed', 'replaced']): manager_change_results.append(result) if any(term in combined for term in ['tigers', 'detroit']): tigers_related_results.append(result) if any(term in combined for term in ['interim', 'acting', 'temporary']): interim_results.append(result) print(f"\n📋 CATEGORIZED RESULTS:") print(f"July 2010 mentions: {len(july_2010_results)}") print(f"Manager change mentions: {len(manager_change_results)}") print(f"Tigers-related mentions: {len(tigers_related_results)}") print(f"Interim/Acting manager mentions: {len(interim_results)}") # Display most relevant findings if july_2010_results: print(f"\n🎯 JULY 2010 RELEVANT RESULTS:") for i, result in enumerate(july_2010_results[:5], 1): print(f"\n{i}. {result['title']}") print(f" Query: {result['query_text']}") print(f" Link: {result['link']}") print(f" Description: {result['description'][:150]}...") if interim_results: print(f"\n🔄 INTERIM/ACTING MANAGER RESULTS:") for i, result in enumerate(interim_results[:3], 1): print(f"\n{i}. {result['title']}") print(f" Query: {result['query_text']}") print(f" Description: {result['description'][:150]}...") if tigers_related_results: print(f"\n🐅 DETROIT TIGERS RELATED RESULTS:") for i, result in enumerate(tigers_related_results[:3], 1): print(f"\n{i}. {result['title']}") print(f" Description: {result['description'][:150]}...") # Create analysis summary analysis_file = f'workspace/mlb_july_2010_analysis_summary_{timestamp}.txt' with open(analysis_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: f.write("MLB JULY 2010 MANAGERIAL CHANGES - COMPREHENSIVE SEARCH ANALYSIS\n") f.write("=" * 65 + "\n\n") f.write(f"Analysis Date: {datetime.now().strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')}\n") f.write(f"Total Search Queries: {search_summary['total_queries']}\n") f.write(f"Successful Searches: {search_summary['successful_searches']}\n") f.write(f"Failed Searches: {search_summary['failed_searches']}\n") f.write(f"Total Search Results: {search_summary['total_results']}\n\n") f.write("SEARCH OBJECTIVES STATUS:\n") f.write("-" * 25 + "\n") f.write(f"1. July 2010 MLB managerial changes: {len(july_2010_results)} relevant results\n") f.write(f"2. Manager dismissals/appointments: {len(manager_change_results)} relevant results\n") f.write(f"3. Interim/Acting appointments: {len(interim_results)} relevant results\n") f.write(f"4. Detroit Tigers connections: {len(tigers_related_results)} relevant results\n\n") if july_2010_results: f.write("TOP JULY 2010 FINDINGS:\n") f.write("-" * 25 + "\n") for i, result in enumerate(july_2010_results[:5], 1): f.write(f"{i}. {result['title']}\n") f.write(f" Query: {result['query_text']}\n") f.write(f" Link: {result['link']}\n\n") if interim_results: f.write("INTERIM/ACTING MANAGER FINDINGS:\n") f.write("-" * 35 + "\n") for i, result in enumerate(interim_results[:3], 1): f.write(f"{i}. {result['title']}\n") f.write(f" Description: {result['description'][:100]}...\n\n") print(f"\n📁 Analysis complete. Files saved:") print(f"Search results: {results_file}") print(f"Analysis summary: {analysis_file}") print(f"\n🎯 PRELIMINARY ASSESSMENT:") print(f"=" * 30) if search_summary['successful_searches'] > 0: print(f"✅ Successfully completed {search_summary['successful_searches']} out of {search_summary['total_queries']} searches") print(f"📊 Collected {search_summary['total_results']} total search results") if july_2010_results: print(f"🎯 Found {len(july_2010_results)} results specifically mentioning July 2010") if interim_results: print(f"🔄 Found {len(interim_results)} results about interim/acting managers") if tigers_related_results: print(f"🐅 Found {len(tigers_related_results)} results related to Detroit Tigers") print(f"\n📋 Next step: Detailed analysis of results to identify specific managerial changes") else: print(f"❌ No successful searches completed - may need alternative search approach") print(f"\n🏁 Comprehensive search phase complete - ready for detailed analysis!")
Execution Output
Code Output: Inspecting workspace for existing MLB managerial change research files... ====================================================================== Execution error: NameError: name 'file' is not defined Error/Warning: Traceback (most recent call last): File "/Users/xushiyue.6/codes/EvolAgent/src/utils/interpreter.py", line 367, in interpret_code exec(code, execution_globals, {}) # 使用独立的 locals ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ File "<string>", line 16, in <module> File "<string>", line 16, in <genexpr> NameError: name 'file' is not defined
tester
2025-08-12 23:05:35
Tester Feedback
Tester Feedback:
Execution failed - NameError on line 15 due to variable scope issue in the list comprehension. The code attempts to use 'file' in the any() function within the list comprehension, but 'file' is not accessible in that scope. This is a recurring variable scoping problem that has prevented execution in all previous attempts in HISTORY. The error occurs during workspace file inspection, blocking all subsequent MLB managerial change searches from running. **PLAN** alignment: 0% - no research completed due to early crash in file inspection phase. The targeted searches for July 2010 MLB managerial dismissals, interim appointments, and Detroit Tigers alumni connections cannot execute. Recommended fix: Rewrite the file inspection logic to avoid the scoping issue - either move the filtering logic outside the list comprehension or use a simpler approach like: files_list = os.listdir('workspace') followed by a separate filtering loop.
Python Code python
import os import json from datetime import datetime from ddgs import DDGS import time # First, let's inspect workspace to see if there are any existing files from previous research print("Inspecting workspace for existing MLB managerial change research files...") print("=" * 70) workspace_files = [] if os.path.exists('workspace'): # Fixed: Properly define and use consistent variable naming files_list = os.listdir('workspace') for file in files_list: if any(term in file.lower() for term in ['mlb', 'manager', 'baseball', 'july', '2010', 'tigers']): workspace_files.append(file) print(f"Found existing file: {file}") else: os.makedirs('workspace') print("Created workspace directory") if workspace_files: print(f"\nFound {len(workspace_files)} existing files related to MLB managerial research") # Inspect the structure of the most recent file latest_file = max(workspace_files, key=lambda x: os.path.getmtime(f'workspace/{x}')) print(f"\nInspecting structure of most recent file: {latest_file}") print("-" * 50) try: with open(f'workspace/{latest_file}', 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f: if latest_file.endswith('.json'): data = json.load(f) print(f"JSON file structure:") for key in data.keys(): print(f" - {key}: {type(data[key])}") if isinstance(data[key], list) and len(data[key]) > 0: print(f" Sample item: {type(data[key][0])}") elif isinstance(data[key], dict) and len(data[key]) > 0: print(f" Keys: {list(data[key].keys())[:3]}...") else: content = f.read() print(f"Text file preview (first 200 chars):") print(content[:200] + "..." if len(content) > 200 else content) except Exception as e: print(f"Error inspecting file: {e}") else: print("No existing MLB managerial research files found") print("\n" + "=" * 70) print("STARTING COMPREHENSIVE MLB JULY 2010 MANAGERIAL CHANGES SEARCH") print("=" * 70) # Define targeted search queries for MLB managerial changes in July 2010 search_queries = [ 'MLB manager dismissed July 2010', 'baseball manager fired July 2010', 'MLB manager interim appointment July 2010', 'July 2010 MLB coaching changes', 'MLB managerial changes summer 2010', 'Detroit Tigers alumni managers MLB history', 'baseball manager temporary appointment July 2010', 'MLB acting manager July 2010', 'baseball coaching staff changes July 2010', 'MLB manager replacement July 2010' ] print(f"Executing {len(search_queries)} targeted searches for MLB managerial changes...") print(f"Focus: July 2010 MLB managerial dismissals, interim appointments, Detroit Tigers alumni") # Initialize search results storage all_search_results = [] search_summary = { 'search_timestamp': datetime.now().isoformat(), 'search_focus': 'MLB managerial changes July 2010 with Detroit Tigers alumni focus', 'total_queries': len(search_queries), 'successful_searches': 0, 'failed_searches': 0, 'queries_executed': search_queries } # Execute searches with error handling and delays searcher = DDGS(timeout=15) for i, query in enumerate(search_queries, 1): print(f"\nSearch {i}/{len(search_queries)}: {query}") print("-" * 60) try: # Execute search with fallback backends results = searcher.text( query, max_results=8, page=1, backend=["google", "duckduckgo", "bing", "yahoo"], safesearch="off", region="en-us" ) if results and len(results) > 0: print(f"✅ Found {len(results)} results for search {i}") search_summary['successful_searches'] += 1 # Process and display results for j, result in enumerate(results, 1): title = result.get('title', 'No title') href = result.get('href', 'No link') body = result.get('body', 'No description') print(f"\nResult {j}:") print(f"Title: {title}") print(f"Link: {href}") print(f"Description: {body}") # Store result with search context result_entry = { 'search_number': i, 'query_text': query, 'result_number': j, 'title': title, 'link': href, 'description': body } all_search_results.append(result_entry) # Analyze for key indicators combined_text = f"{title.lower()} {body.lower()}" # Check for July 2010 relevance july_2010_indicators = ['july 2010', '2010', 'summer 2010'] manager_indicators = ['manager', 'coach', 'fired', 'dismissed', 'interim', 'acting', 'appointed', 'replaced'] tigers_indicators = ['tigers', 'detroit', 'comerica'] july_matches = [term for term in july_2010_indicators if term in combined_text] manager_matches = [term for term in manager_indicators if term in combined_text] tigers_matches = [term for term in tigers_indicators if term in combined_text] if july_matches and manager_matches: print(f"🎯 HIGHLY RELEVANT - July 2010 + Manager: {', '.join(july_matches + manager_matches)}") if tigers_matches: print(f"🐅 TIGERS CONNECTION: {', '.join(tigers_matches)}") # Look for specific manager names potential_managers = ['leyland', 'gardenhire', 'maddon', 'francona', 'torre', 'manuel', 'washington', 'wedge'] mentioned_managers = [name for name in potential_managers if name in combined_text] if mentioned_managers: print(f"👤 MANAGER MENTIONS: {', '.join(mentioned_managers)}") print("-" * 40) else: print(f"⚠️ No results found for search {i}: '{query}'") search_summary['failed_searches'] += 1 # Add empty result entry all_search_results.append({ 'search_number': i, 'query_text': query, 'result_number': 0, 'title': 'No results', 'link': 'N/A', 'description': 'No results found for this query' }) except Exception as e: print(f"❌ Error during search {i}: {str(e)}") search_summary['failed_searches'] += 1 # Add error result entry all_search_results.append({ 'search_number': i, 'query_text': query, 'result_number': 0, 'title': 'Search error', 'link': 'N/A', 'description': f'Search failed with error: {str(e)}' }) # Add delay between searches to avoid rate limiting if i < len(search_queries): print(f"\n⏳ Waiting 2 seconds before next search...") time.sleep(2) print("\n" + "=" * 70) # Update search summary search_summary['total_results'] = len(all_search_results) search_summary['all_search_results'] = all_search_results # Save comprehensive search results timestamp = datetime.now().strftime("%Y%m%d_%H%M%S") results_file = f"workspace/mlb_july_2010_managerial_changes_search_{timestamp}.json" with open(results_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump(search_summary, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f"\n📊 COMPREHENSIVE SEARCH SUMMARY:") print(f"Total targeted queries executed: {search_summary['total_queries']}") print(f"Successful searches: {search_summary['successful_searches']}") print(f"Failed searches: {search_summary['failed_searches']}") print(f"Total results collected: {search_summary['total_results']}") print(f"Search results saved to: {results_file}") # Analyze results for specific findings print("\n🔍 ANALYZING RESULTS FOR MLB JULY 2010 MANAGERIAL CHANGES:") print("=" * 60) # Categorize results by relevance july_2010_results = [] manager_change_results = [] tigers_related_results = [] interim_results = [] for result in all_search_results: if result['title'] in ['No results', 'Search error']: continue title_lower = result['title'].lower() desc_lower = result['description'].lower() combined = f"{title_lower} {desc_lower}" # Categorize by relevance if any(term in combined for term in ['july 2010', '2010']): july_2010_results.append(result) if any(term in combined for term in ['manager', 'fired', 'dismissed', 'appointed', 'replaced']): manager_change_results.append(result) if any(term in combined for term in ['tigers', 'detroit']): tigers_related_results.append(result) if any(term in combined for term in ['interim', 'acting', 'temporary']): interim_results.append(result) print(f"\n📋 CATEGORIZED RESULTS:") print(f"July 2010 mentions: {len(july_2010_results)}") print(f"Manager change mentions: {len(manager_change_results)}") print(f"Tigers-related mentions: {len(tigers_related_results)}") print(f"Interim/Acting manager mentions: {len(interim_results)}") # Display most relevant findings if july_2010_results: print(f"\n🎯 JULY 2010 RELEVANT RESULTS:") for i, result in enumerate(july_2010_results[:5], 1): print(f"\n{i}. {result['title']}") print(f" Query: {result['query_text']}") print(f" Link: {result['link']}") print(f" Description: {result['description'][:150]}...") if interim_results: print(f"\n🔄 INTERIM/ACTING MANAGER RESULTS:") for i, result in enumerate(interim_results[:3], 1): print(f"\n{i}. {result['title']}") print(f" Query: {result['query_text']}") print(f" Description: {result['description'][:150]}...") if tigers_related_results: print(f"\n🐅 DETROIT TIGERS RELATED RESULTS:") for i, result in enumerate(tigers_related_results[:3], 1): print(f"\n{i}. {result['title']}") print(f" Description: {result['description'][:150]}...") # Create analysis summary analysis_file = f'workspace/mlb_july_2010_analysis_summary_{timestamp}.txt' with open(analysis_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: f.write("MLB JULY 2010 MANAGERIAL CHANGES - COMPREHENSIVE SEARCH ANALYSIS\n") f.write("=" * 65 + "\n\n") f.write(f"Analysis Date: {datetime.now().strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')}\n") f.write(f"Total Search Queries: {search_summary['total_queries']}\n") f.write(f"Successful Searches: {search_summary['successful_searches']}\n") f.write(f"Failed Searches: {search_summary['failed_searches']}\n") f.write(f"Total Search Results: {search_summary['total_results']}\n\n") f.write("SEARCH OBJECTIVES STATUS:\n") f.write("-" * 25 + "\n") f.write(f"1. July 2010 MLB managerial changes: {len(july_2010_results)} relevant results\n") f.write(f"2. Manager dismissals/appointments: {len(manager_change_results)} relevant results\n") f.write(f"3. Interim/Acting appointments: {len(interim_results)} relevant results\n") f.write(f"4. Detroit Tigers connections: {len(tigers_related_results)} relevant results\n\n") if july_2010_results: f.write("TOP JULY 2010 FINDINGS:\n") f.write("-" * 25 + "\n") for i, result in enumerate(july_2010_results[:5], 1): f.write(f"{i}. {result['title']}\n") f.write(f" Query: {result['query_text']}\n") f.write(f" Link: {result['link']}\n\n") if interim_results: f.write("INTERIM/ACTING MANAGER FINDINGS:\n") f.write("-" * 35 + "\n") for i, result in enumerate(interim_results[:3], 1): f.write(f"{i}. {result['title']}\n") f.write(f" Description: {result['description'][:100]}...\n\n") print(f"\n📁 Analysis complete. Files saved:") print(f"Search results: {results_file}") print(f"Analysis summary: {analysis_file}") print(f"\n🎯 PRELIMINARY ASSESSMENT:") print(f"=" * 30) if search_summary['successful_searches'] > 0: print(f"✅ Successfully completed {search_summary['successful_searches']} out of {search_summary['total_queries']} searches") print(f"📊 Collected {search_summary['total_results']} total search results") if july_2010_results: print(f"🎯 Found {len(july_2010_results)} results specifically mentioning July 2010") if interim_results: print(f"🔄 Found {len(interim_results)} results about interim/acting managers") if tigers_related_results: print(f"🐅 Found {len(tigers_related_results)} results related to Detroit Tigers") print(f"\n📋 Next step: Detailed analysis of results to identify specific managerial changes") else: print(f"❌ No successful searches completed - may need alternative search approach") print(f"\n🏁 Comprehensive search phase complete - ready for detailed analysis!")

Python Code python
import os import json from datetime import datetime from ddgs import DDGS import time # First, let's inspect workspace to see if there are any existing files from previous research print("Inspecting workspace for existing MLB managerial change research files...") print("=" * 70) workspace_files = [] if os.path.exists('workspace'): # Fixed: Completely rewrite file inspection to avoid scoping issues all_files = os.listdir('workspace') for filename in all_files: # Check if file contains relevant terms relevant_terms = ['mlb', 'manager', 'baseball', 'july', '2010', 'tigers'] if any(term in filename.lower() for term in relevant_terms): workspace_files.append(filename) print(f"Found existing file: {filename}") else: os.makedirs('workspace') print("Created workspace directory") if workspace_files: print(f"\nFound {len(workspace_files)} existing files related to MLB managerial research") # Inspect the structure of the most recent file latest_file = max(workspace_files, key=lambda x: os.path.getmtime(f'workspace/{x}')) print(f"\nInspecting structure of most recent file: {latest_file}") print("-" * 50) try: with open(f'workspace/{latest_file}', 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f: if latest_file.endswith('.json'): data = json.load(f) print(f"JSON file structure:") for key in data.keys(): print(f" - {key}: {type(data[key])}") if isinstance(data[key], list) and len(data[key]) > 0: print(f" Sample item: {type(data[key][0])}") elif isinstance(data[key], dict) and len(data[key]) > 0: print(f" Keys: {list(data[key].keys())[:3]}...") else: content = f.read() print(f"Text file preview (first 200 chars):") print(content[:200] + "..." if len(content) > 200 else content) except Exception as e: print(f"Error inspecting file: {e}") else: print("No existing MLB managerial research files found") print("\n" + "=" * 70) print("STARTING COMPREHENSIVE MLB JULY 2010 MANAGERIAL CHANGES SEARCH") print("=" * 70) # Define targeted search queries for MLB managerial changes in July 2010 search_queries = [ 'MLB manager dismissed July 2010', 'baseball manager fired July 2010', 'MLB manager interim appointment July 2010', 'July 2010 MLB coaching changes', 'MLB managerial changes summer 2010', 'Detroit Tigers alumni managers MLB history', 'baseball manager temporary appointment July 2010', 'MLB acting manager July 2010', 'baseball coaching staff changes July 2010', 'MLB manager replacement July 2010' ] print(f"Executing {len(search_queries)} targeted searches for MLB managerial changes...") print(f"Focus: July 2010 MLB managerial dismissals, interim appointments, Detroit Tigers alumni") # Initialize search results storage all_search_results = [] search_summary = { 'search_timestamp': datetime.now().isoformat(), 'search_focus': 'MLB managerial changes July 2010 with Detroit Tigers alumni focus', 'total_queries': len(search_queries), 'successful_searches': 0, 'failed_searches': 0, 'queries_executed': search_queries } # Execute searches with error handling and delays searcher = DDGS(timeout=15) for i, query in enumerate(search_queries, 1): print(f"\nSearch {i}/{len(search_queries)}: {query}") print("-" * 60) try: # Execute search with fallback backends results = searcher.text( query, max_results=8, page=1, backend=["google", "duckduckgo", "bing", "yahoo"], safesearch="off", region="en-us" ) if results and len(results) > 0: print(f"✅ Found {len(results)} results for search {i}") search_summary['successful_searches'] += 1 # Process and display results for j, result in enumerate(results, 1): title = result.get('title', 'No title') href = result.get('href', 'No link') body = result.get('body', 'No description') print(f"\nResult {j}:") print(f"Title: {title}") print(f"Link: {href}") print(f"Description: {body}") # Store result with search context result_entry = { 'search_number': i, 'query_text': query, 'result_number': j, 'title': title, 'link': href, 'description': body } all_search_results.append(result_entry) # Analyze for key indicators combined_text = f"{title.lower()} {body.lower()}" # Check for July 2010 relevance july_2010_indicators = ['july 2010', '2010', 'summer 2010'] manager_indicators = ['manager', 'coach', 'fired', 'dismissed', 'interim', 'acting', 'appointed', 'replaced'] tigers_indicators = ['tigers', 'detroit', 'comerica'] july_matches = [term for term in july_2010_indicators if term in combined_text] manager_matches = [term for term in manager_indicators if term in combined_text] tigers_matches = [term for term in tigers_indicators if term in combined_text] if july_matches and manager_matches: print(f"🎯 HIGHLY RELEVANT - July 2010 + Manager: {', '.join(july_matches + manager_matches)}") if tigers_matches: print(f"🐅 TIGERS CONNECTION: {', '.join(tigers_matches)}") # Look for specific manager names potential_managers = ['leyland', 'gardenhire', 'maddon', 'francona', 'torre', 'manuel', 'washington', 'wedge'] mentioned_managers = [name for name in potential_managers if name in combined_text] if mentioned_managers: print(f"👤 MANAGER MENTIONS: {', '.join(mentioned_managers)}") print("-" * 40) else: print(f"⚠️ No results found for search {i}: '{query}'") search_summary['failed_searches'] += 1 # Add empty result entry all_search_results.append({ 'search_number': i, 'query_text': query, 'result_number': 0, 'title': 'No results', 'link': 'N/A', 'description': 'No results found for this query' }) except Exception as e: print(f"❌ Error during search {i}: {str(e)}") search_summary['failed_searches'] += 1 # Add error result entry all_search_results.append({ 'search_number': i, 'query_text': query, 'result_number': 0, 'title': 'Search error', 'link': 'N/A', 'description': f'Search failed with error: {str(e)}' }) # Add delay between searches to avoid rate limiting if i < len(search_queries): print(f"\n⏳ Waiting 2 seconds before next search...") time.sleep(2) print("\n" + "=" * 70) # Update search summary search_summary['total_results'] = len(all_search_results) search_summary['all_search_results'] = all_search_results # Save comprehensive search results timestamp = datetime.now().strftime("%Y%m%d_%H%M%S") results_file = f"workspace/mlb_july_2010_managerial_changes_search_{timestamp}.json" with open(results_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump(search_summary, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f"\n📊 COMPREHENSIVE SEARCH SUMMARY:") print(f"Total targeted queries executed: {search_summary['total_queries']}") print(f"Successful searches: {search_summary['successful_searches']}") print(f"Failed searches: {search_summary['failed_searches']}") print(f"Total results collected: {search_summary['total_results']}") print(f"Search results saved to: {results_file}") # Analyze results for specific findings print("\n🔍 ANALYZING RESULTS FOR MLB JULY 2010 MANAGERIAL CHANGES:") print("=" * 60) # Categorize results by relevance july_2010_results = [] manager_change_results = [] tigers_related_results = [] interim_results = [] for result in all_search_results: if result['title'] in ['No results', 'Search error']: continue title_lower = result['title'].lower() desc_lower = result['description'].lower() combined = f"{title_lower} {desc_lower}" # Categorize by relevance if any(term in combined for term in ['july 2010', '2010']): july_2010_results.append(result) if any(term in combined for term in ['manager', 'fired', 'dismissed', 'appointed', 'replaced']): manager_change_results.append(result) if any(term in combined for term in ['tigers', 'detroit']): tigers_related_results.append(result) if any(term in combined for term in ['interim', 'acting', 'temporary']): interim_results.append(result) print(f"\n📋 CATEGORIZED RESULTS:") print(f"July 2010 mentions: {len(july_2010_results)}") print(f"Manager change mentions: {len(manager_change_results)}") print(f"Tigers-related mentions: {len(tigers_related_results)}") print(f"Interim/Acting manager mentions: {len(interim_results)}") # Display most relevant findings if july_2010_results: print(f"\n🎯 JULY 2010 RELEVANT RESULTS:") for i, result in enumerate(july_2010_results[:5], 1): print(f"\n{i}. {result['title']}") print(f" Query: {result['query_text']}") print(f" Link: {result['link']}") print(f" Description: {result['description'][:150]}...") if interim_results: print(f"\n🔄 INTERIM/ACTING MANAGER RESULTS:") for i, result in enumerate(interim_results[:3], 1): print(f"\n{i}. {result['title']}") print(f" Query: {result['query_text']}") print(f" Description: {result['description'][:150]}...") if tigers_related_results: print(f"\n🐅 DETROIT TIGERS RELATED RESULTS:") for i, result in enumerate(tigers_related_results[:3], 1): print(f"\n{i}. {result['title']}") print(f" Description: {result['description'][:150]}...") # Create analysis summary analysis_file = f'workspace/mlb_july_2010_analysis_summary_{timestamp}.txt' with open(analysis_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: f.write("MLB JULY 2010 MANAGERIAL CHANGES - COMPREHENSIVE SEARCH ANALYSIS\n") f.write("=" * 65 + "\n\n") f.write(f"Analysis Date: {datetime.now().strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')}\n") f.write(f"Total Search Queries: {search_summary['total_queries']}\n") f.write(f"Successful Searches: {search_summary['successful_searches']}\n") f.write(f"Failed Searches: {search_summary['failed_searches']}\n") f.write(f"Total Search Results: {search_summary['total_results']}\n\n") f.write("SEARCH OBJECTIVES STATUS:\n") f.write("-" * 25 + "\n") f.write(f"1. July 2010 MLB managerial changes: {len(july_2010_results)} relevant results\n") f.write(f"2. Manager dismissals/appointments: {len(manager_change_results)} relevant results\n") f.write(f"3. Interim/Acting appointments: {len(interim_results)} relevant results\n") f.write(f"4. Detroit Tigers connections: {len(tigers_related_results)} relevant results\n\n") if july_2010_results: f.write("TOP JULY 2010 FINDINGS:\n") f.write("-" * 25 + "\n") for i, result in enumerate(july_2010_results[:5], 1): f.write(f"{i}. {result['title']}\n") f.write(f" Query: {result['query_text']}\n") f.write(f" Link: {result['link']}\n\n") if interim_results: f.write("INTERIM/ACTING MANAGER FINDINGS:\n") f.write("-" * 35 + "\n") for i, result in enumerate(interim_results[:3], 1): f.write(f"{i}. {result['title']}\n") f.write(f" Description: {result['description'][:100]}...\n\n") print(f"\n📁 Analysis complete. Files saved:") print(f"Search results: {results_file}") print(f"Analysis summary: {analysis_file}") print(f"\n🎯 PRELIMINARY ASSESSMENT:") print(f"=" * 30) if search_summary['successful_searches'] > 0: print(f"✅ Successfully completed {search_summary['successful_searches']} out of {search_summary['total_queries']} searches") print(f"📊 Collected {search_summary['total_results']} total search results") if july_2010_results: print(f"🎯 Found {len(july_2010_results)} results specifically mentioning July 2010") if interim_results: print(f"🔄 Found {len(interim_results)} results about interim/acting managers") if tigers_related_results: print(f"🐅 Found {len(tigers_related_results)} results related to Detroit Tigers") print(f"\n📋 Next step: Detailed analysis of results to identify specific managerial changes") else: print(f"❌ No successful searches completed - may need alternative search approach") print(f"\n🏁 Comprehensive search phase complete - ready for detailed analysis!")
Execution Output
Code Output: Inspecting workspace for existing MLB managerial change research files... ====================================================================== Execution error: NameError: name 'filename' is not defined Error/Warning: Traceback (most recent call last): File "/Users/xushiyue.6/codes/EvolAgent/src/utils/interpreter.py", line 367, in interpret_code exec(code, execution_globals, {}) # 使用独立的 locals ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ File "<string>", line 18, in <module> File "<string>", line 18, in <genexpr> NameError: name 'filename' is not defined
tester
2025-08-12 23:06:45
Tester Feedback
Tester Feedback:
Execution failed - NameError on line 16 due to variable scope issue in the list comprehension. The code has a persistent variable scoping problem where 'file' is defined in the for loop but cannot be accessed within the any() function's generator expression. This is the same recurring error from all previous attempts in HISTORY, preventing the workspace inspection and blocking all subsequent MLB managerial change searches from executing. **PLAN** alignment: 0% - no searches completed due to early crash. The error occurs before any of the 10 targeted searches for July 2010 MLB managerial changes, interim appointments, or Detroit Tigers alumni connections can be executed. Recommended fix: Completely rewrite the file inspection section to avoid the scoping issue - use a simple approach like: workspace_files = []; for file in os.listdir('workspace'): if any(term in file.lower() for term in ['mlb', 'manager', 'baseball', 'july', '2010', 'tigers']): workspace_files.append(file)
Python Code python
import os import json from datetime import datetime from ddgs import DDGS import time # First, let's inspect workspace to see if there are any existing files from previous research print("Inspecting workspace for existing MLB managerial change research files...") print("=" * 70) workspace_files = [] if os.path.exists('workspace'): # Fixed: Completely rewrite file inspection to avoid scoping issues all_files = os.listdir('workspace') for filename in all_files: # Check if file contains relevant terms relevant_terms = ['mlb', 'manager', 'baseball', 'july', '2010', 'tigers'] if any(term in filename.lower() for term in relevant_terms): workspace_files.append(filename) print(f"Found existing file: {filename}") else: os.makedirs('workspace') print("Created workspace directory") if workspace_files: print(f"\nFound {len(workspace_files)} existing files related to MLB managerial research") # Inspect the structure of the most recent file latest_file = max(workspace_files, key=lambda x: os.path.getmtime(f'workspace/{x}')) print(f"\nInspecting structure of most recent file: {latest_file}") print("-" * 50) try: with open(f'workspace/{latest_file}', 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f: if latest_file.endswith('.json'): data = json.load(f) print(f"JSON file structure:") for key in data.keys(): print(f" - {key}: {type(data[key])}") if isinstance(data[key], list) and len(data[key]) > 0: print(f" Sample item: {type(data[key][0])}") elif isinstance(data[key], dict) and len(data[key]) > 0: print(f" Keys: {list(data[key].keys())[:3]}...") else: content = f.read() print(f"Text file preview (first 200 chars):") print(content[:200] + "..." if len(content) > 200 else content) except Exception as e: print(f"Error inspecting file: {e}") else: print("No existing MLB managerial research files found") print("\n" + "=" * 70) print("STARTING COMPREHENSIVE MLB JULY 2010 MANAGERIAL CHANGES SEARCH") print("=" * 70) # Define targeted search queries for MLB managerial changes in July 2010 search_queries = [ 'MLB manager dismissed July 2010', 'baseball manager fired July 2010', 'MLB manager interim appointment July 2010', 'July 2010 MLB coaching changes', 'MLB managerial changes summer 2010', 'Detroit Tigers alumni managers MLB history', 'baseball manager temporary appointment July 2010', 'MLB acting manager July 2010', 'baseball coaching staff changes July 2010', 'MLB manager replacement July 2010' ] print(f"Executing {len(search_queries)} targeted searches for MLB managerial changes...") print(f"Focus: July 2010 MLB managerial dismissals, interim appointments, Detroit Tigers alumni") # Initialize search results storage all_search_results = [] search_summary = { 'search_timestamp': datetime.now().isoformat(), 'search_focus': 'MLB managerial changes July 2010 with Detroit Tigers alumni focus', 'total_queries': len(search_queries), 'successful_searches': 0, 'failed_searches': 0, 'queries_executed': search_queries } # Execute searches with error handling and delays searcher = DDGS(timeout=15) for i, query in enumerate(search_queries, 1): print(f"\nSearch {i}/{len(search_queries)}: {query}") print("-" * 60) try: # Execute search with fallback backends results = searcher.text( query, max_results=8, page=1, backend=["google", "duckduckgo", "bing", "yahoo"], safesearch="off", region="en-us" ) if results and len(results) > 0: print(f"✅ Found {len(results)} results for search {i}") search_summary['successful_searches'] += 1 # Process and display results for j, result in enumerate(results, 1): title = result.get('title', 'No title') href = result.get('href', 'No link') body = result.get('body', 'No description') print(f"\nResult {j}:") print(f"Title: {title}") print(f"Link: {href}") print(f"Description: {body}") # Store result with search context result_entry = { 'search_number': i, 'query_text': query, 'result_number': j, 'title': title, 'link': href, 'description': body } all_search_results.append(result_entry) # Analyze for key indicators combined_text = f"{title.lower()} {body.lower()}" # Check for July 2010 relevance july_2010_indicators = ['july 2010', '2010', 'summer 2010'] manager_indicators = ['manager', 'coach', 'fired', 'dismissed', 'interim', 'acting', 'appointed', 'replaced'] tigers_indicators = ['tigers', 'detroit', 'comerica'] july_matches = [term for term in july_2010_indicators if term in combined_text] manager_matches = [term for term in manager_indicators if term in combined_text] tigers_matches = [term for term in tigers_indicators if term in combined_text] if july_matches and manager_matches: print(f"🎯 HIGHLY RELEVANT - July 2010 + Manager: {', '.join(july_matches + manager_matches)}") if tigers_matches: print(f"🐅 TIGERS CONNECTION: {', '.join(tigers_matches)}") # Look for specific manager names potential_managers = ['leyland', 'gardenhire', 'maddon', 'francona', 'torre', 'manuel', 'washington', 'wedge'] mentioned_managers = [name for name in potential_managers if name in combined_text] if mentioned_managers: print(f"👤 MANAGER MENTIONS: {', '.join(mentioned_managers)}") print("-" * 40) else: print(f"⚠️ No results found for search {i}: '{query}'") search_summary['failed_searches'] += 1 # Add empty result entry all_search_results.append({ 'search_number': i, 'query_text': query, 'result_number': 0, 'title': 'No results', 'link': 'N/A', 'description': 'No results found for this query' }) except Exception as e: print(f"❌ Error during search {i}: {str(e)}") search_summary['failed_searches'] += 1 # Add error result entry all_search_results.append({ 'search_number': i, 'query_text': query, 'result_number': 0, 'title': 'Search error', 'link': 'N/A', 'description': f'Search failed with error: {str(e)}' }) # Add delay between searches to avoid rate limiting if i < len(search_queries): print(f"\n⏳ Waiting 2 seconds before next search...") time.sleep(2) print("\n" + "=" * 70) # Update search summary search_summary['total_results'] = len(all_search_results) search_summary['all_search_results'] = all_search_results # Save comprehensive search results timestamp = datetime.now().strftime("%Y%m%d_%H%M%S") results_file = f"workspace/mlb_july_2010_managerial_changes_search_{timestamp}.json" with open(results_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump(search_summary, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f"\n📊 COMPREHENSIVE SEARCH SUMMARY:") print(f"Total targeted queries executed: {search_summary['total_queries']}") print(f"Successful searches: {search_summary['successful_searches']}") print(f"Failed searches: {search_summary['failed_searches']}") print(f"Total results collected: {search_summary['total_results']}") print(f"Search results saved to: {results_file}") # Analyze results for specific findings print("\n🔍 ANALYZING RESULTS FOR MLB JULY 2010 MANAGERIAL CHANGES:") print("=" * 60) # Categorize results by relevance july_2010_results = [] manager_change_results = [] tigers_related_results = [] interim_results = [] for result in all_search_results: if result['title'] in ['No results', 'Search error']: continue title_lower = result['title'].lower() desc_lower = result['description'].lower() combined = f"{title_lower} {desc_lower}" # Categorize by relevance if any(term in combined for term in ['july 2010', '2010']): july_2010_results.append(result) if any(term in combined for term in ['manager', 'fired', 'dismissed', 'appointed', 'replaced']): manager_change_results.append(result) if any(term in combined for term in ['tigers', 'detroit']): tigers_related_results.append(result) if any(term in combined for term in ['interim', 'acting', 'temporary']): interim_results.append(result) print(f"\n📋 CATEGORIZED RESULTS:") print(f"July 2010 mentions: {len(july_2010_results)}") print(f"Manager change mentions: {len(manager_change_results)}") print(f"Tigers-related mentions: {len(tigers_related_results)}") print(f"Interim/Acting manager mentions: {len(interim_results)}") # Display most relevant findings if july_2010_results: print(f"\n🎯 JULY 2010 RELEVANT RESULTS:") for i, result in enumerate(july_2010_results[:5], 1): print(f"\n{i}. {result['title']}") print(f" Query: {result['query_text']}") print(f" Link: {result['link']}") print(f" Description: {result['description'][:150]}...") if interim_results: print(f"\n🔄 INTERIM/ACTING MANAGER RESULTS:") for i, result in enumerate(interim_results[:3], 1): print(f"\n{i}. {result['title']}") print(f" Query: {result['query_text']}") print(f" Description: {result['description'][:150]}...") if tigers_related_results: print(f"\n🐅 DETROIT TIGERS RELATED RESULTS:") for i, result in enumerate(tigers_related_results[:3], 1): print(f"\n{i}. {result['title']}") print(f" Description: {result['description'][:150]}...") # Create analysis summary analysis_file = f'workspace/mlb_july_2010_analysis_summary_{timestamp}.txt' with open(analysis_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: f.write("MLB JULY 2010 MANAGERIAL CHANGES - COMPREHENSIVE SEARCH ANALYSIS\n") f.write("=" * 65 + "\n\n") f.write(f"Analysis Date: {datetime.now().strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')}\n") f.write(f"Total Search Queries: {search_summary['total_queries']}\n") f.write(f"Successful Searches: {search_summary['successful_searches']}\n") f.write(f"Failed Searches: {search_summary['failed_searches']}\n") f.write(f"Total Search Results: {search_summary['total_results']}\n\n") f.write("SEARCH OBJECTIVES STATUS:\n") f.write("-" * 25 + "\n") f.write(f"1. July 2010 MLB managerial changes: {len(july_2010_results)} relevant results\n") f.write(f"2. Manager dismissals/appointments: {len(manager_change_results)} relevant results\n") f.write(f"3. Interim/Acting appointments: {len(interim_results)} relevant results\n") f.write(f"4. Detroit Tigers connections: {len(tigers_related_results)} relevant results\n\n") if july_2010_results: f.write("TOP JULY 2010 FINDINGS:\n") f.write("-" * 25 + "\n") for i, result in enumerate(july_2010_results[:5], 1): f.write(f"{i}. {result['title']}\n") f.write(f" Query: {result['query_text']}\n") f.write(f" Link: {result['link']}\n\n") if interim_results: f.write("INTERIM/ACTING MANAGER FINDINGS:\n") f.write("-" * 35 + "\n") for i, result in enumerate(interim_results[:3], 1): f.write(f"{i}. {result['title']}\n") f.write(f" Description: {result['description'][:100]}...\n\n") print(f"\n📁 Analysis complete. Files saved:") print(f"Search results: {results_file}") print(f"Analysis summary: {analysis_file}") print(f"\n🎯 PRELIMINARY ASSESSMENT:") print(f"=" * 30) if search_summary['successful_searches'] > 0: print(f"✅ Successfully completed {search_summary['successful_searches']} out of {search_summary['total_queries']} searches") print(f"📊 Collected {search_summary['total_results']} total search results") if july_2010_results: print(f"🎯 Found {len(july_2010_results)} results specifically mentioning July 2010") if interim_results: print(f"🔄 Found {len(interim_results)} results about interim/acting managers") if tigers_related_results: print(f"🐅 Found {len(tigers_related_results)} results related to Detroit Tigers") print(f"\n📋 Next step: Detailed analysis of results to identify specific managerial changes") else: print(f"❌ No successful searches completed - may need alternative search approach") print(f"\n🏁 Comprehensive search phase complete - ready for detailed analysis!")

Code Execution - Plan #2 (Iteration 7)
Executing development phase code:
Python Code python
import os import json from datetime import datetime from ddgs import DDGS import time # First, let's inspect workspace to see if there are any existing files from previous research print("Inspecting workspace for existing MLB managerial change research files...") print("=" * 70) workspace_files = [] if os.path.exists('workspace'): # Fixed: Use completely separate approach to avoid scoping issues all_files = os.listdir('workspace') relevant_terms = ['mlb', 'manager', 'baseball', 'july', '2010', 'tigers'] for file_name in all_files: # Check each file separately is_relevant = False for term in relevant_terms: if term in file_name.lower(): is_relevant = True break if is_relevant: workspace_files.append(file_name) print(f"Found existing file: {file_name}") else: os.makedirs('workspace') print("Created workspace directory") if workspace_files: print(f"\nFound {len(workspace_files)} existing files related to MLB managerial research") # Inspect the structure of the most recent file latest_file = max(workspace_files, key=lambda x: os.path.getmtime(f'workspace/{x}')) print(f"\nInspecting structure of most recent file: {latest_file}") print("-" * 50) try: with open(f'workspace/{latest_file}', 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f: if latest_file.endswith('.json'): data = json.load(f) print(f"JSON file structure:") for key in data.keys(): print(f" - {key}: {type(data[key])}") if isinstance(data[key], list) and len(data[key]) > 0: print(f" Sample item: {type(data[key][0])}") elif isinstance(data[key], dict) and len(data[key]) > 0: print(f" Keys: {list(data[key].keys())[:3]}...") else: content = f.read() print(f"Text file preview (first 200 chars):") print(content[:200] + "..." if len(content) > 200 else content) except Exception as e: print(f"Error inspecting file: {e}") else: print("No existing MLB managerial research files found") print("\n" + "=" * 70) print("STARTING COMPREHENSIVE MLB JULY 2010 MANAGERIAL CHANGES SEARCH") print("=" * 70) # Define targeted search queries for MLB managerial changes in July 2010 search_queries = [ 'MLB manager dismissed July 2010', 'baseball manager fired July 2010', 'MLB manager interim appointment July 2010', 'July 2010 MLB coaching changes', 'MLB managerial changes summer 2010', 'Detroit Tigers alumni managers MLB history', 'baseball manager temporary appointment July 2010', 'MLB acting manager July 2010', 'baseball coaching staff changes July 2010', 'MLB manager replacement July 2010' ] print(f"Executing {len(search_queries)} targeted searches for MLB managerial changes...") print(f"Focus: July 2010 MLB managerial dismissals, interim appointments, Detroit Tigers alumni") # Initialize search results storage all_search_results = [] search_summary = { 'search_timestamp': datetime.now().isoformat(), 'search_focus': 'MLB managerial changes July 2010 with Detroit Tigers alumni focus', 'total_queries': len(search_queries), 'successful_searches': 0, 'failed_searches': 0, 'queries_executed': search_queries } # Execute searches with error handling and delays searcher = DDGS(timeout=15) for i, query in enumerate(search_queries, 1): print(f"\nSearch {i}/{len(search_queries)}: {query}") print("-" * 60) try: # Execute search with fallback backends results = searcher.text( query, max_results=8, page=1, backend=["google", "duckduckgo", "bing", "yahoo"], safesearch="off", region="en-us" ) if results and len(results) > 0: print(f"✅ Found {len(results)} results for search {i}") search_summary['successful_searches'] += 1 # Process and display results for j, result in enumerate(results, 1): title = result.get('title', 'No title') href = result.get('href', 'No link') body = result.get('body', 'No description') print(f"\nResult {j}:") print(f"Title: {title}") print(f"Link: {href}") print(f"Description: {body}") # Store result with search context result_entry = { 'search_number': i, 'query_text': query, 'result_number': j, 'title': title, 'link': href, 'description': body } all_search_results.append(result_entry) # Analyze for key indicators combined_text = f"{title.lower()} {body.lower()}" # Check for July 2010 relevance july_2010_indicators = ['july 2010', '2010', 'summer 2010'] manager_indicators = ['manager', 'coach', 'fired', 'dismissed', 'interim', 'acting', 'appointed', 'replaced'] tigers_indicators = ['tigers', 'detroit', 'comerica'] july_matches = [term for term in july_2010_indicators if term in combined_text] manager_matches = [term for term in manager_indicators if term in combined_text] tigers_matches = [term for term in tigers_indicators if term in combined_text] if july_matches and manager_matches: print(f"🎯 HIGHLY RELEVANT - July 2010 + Manager: {', '.join(july_matches + manager_matches)}") if tigers_matches: print(f"🐅 TIGERS CONNECTION: {', '.join(tigers_matches)}") # Look for specific manager names potential_managers = ['leyland', 'gardenhire', 'maddon', 'francona', 'torre', 'manuel', 'washington', 'wedge'] mentioned_managers = [name for name in potential_managers if name in combined_text] if mentioned_managers: print(f"👤 MANAGER MENTIONS: {', '.join(mentioned_managers)}") print("-" * 40) else: print(f"⚠️ No results found for search {i}: '{query}'") search_summary['failed_searches'] += 1 # Add empty result entry all_search_results.append({ 'search_number': i, 'query_text': query, 'result_number': 0, 'title': 'No results', 'link': 'N/A', 'description': 'No results found for this query' }) except Exception as e: print(f"❌ Error during search {i}: {str(e)}") search_summary['failed_searches'] += 1 # Add error result entry all_search_results.append({ 'search_number': i, 'query_text': query, 'result_number': 0, 'title': 'Search error', 'link': 'N/A', 'description': f'Search failed with error: {str(e)}' }) # Add delay between searches to avoid rate limiting if i < len(search_queries): print(f"\n⏳ Waiting 2 seconds before next search...") time.sleep(2) print("\n" + "=" * 70) # Update search summary search_summary['total_results'] = len(all_search_results) search_summary['all_search_results'] = all_search_results # Save comprehensive search results timestamp = datetime.now().strftime("%Y%m%d_%H%M%S") results_file = f"workspace/mlb_july_2010_managerial_changes_search_{timestamp}.json" with open(results_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump(search_summary, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f"\n📊 COMPREHENSIVE SEARCH SUMMARY:") print(f"Total targeted queries executed: {search_summary['total_queries']}") print(f"Successful searches: {search_summary['successful_searches']}") print(f"Failed searches: {search_summary['failed_searches']}") print(f"Total results collected: {search_summary['total_results']}") print(f"Search results saved to: {results_file}") # Analyze results for specific findings print("\n🔍 ANALYZING RESULTS FOR MLB JULY 2010 MANAGERIAL CHANGES:") print("=" * 60) # Categorize results by relevance july_2010_results = [] manager_change_results = [] tigers_related_results = [] interim_results = [] for result in all_search_results: if result['title'] in ['No results', 'Search error']: continue title_lower = result['title'].lower() desc_lower = result['description'].lower() combined = f"{title_lower} {desc_lower}" # Categorize by relevance if any(term in combined for term in ['july 2010', '2010']): july_2010_results.append(result) if any(term in combined for term in ['manager', 'fired', 'dismissed', 'appointed', 'replaced']): manager_change_results.append(result) if any(term in combined for term in ['tigers', 'detroit']): tigers_related_results.append(result) if any(term in combined for term in ['interim', 'acting', 'temporary']): interim_results.append(result) print(f"\n📋 CATEGORIZED RESULTS:") print(f"July 2010 mentions: {len(july_2010_results)}") print(f"Manager change mentions: {len(manager_change_results)}") print(f"Tigers-related mentions: {len(tigers_related_results)}") print(f"Interim/Acting manager mentions: {len(interim_results)}") # Display most relevant findings if july_2010_results: print(f"\n🎯 JULY 2010 RELEVANT RESULTS:") for i, result in enumerate(july_2010_results[:5], 1): print(f"\n{i}. {result['title']}") print(f" Query: {result['query_text']}") print(f" Link: {result['link']}") print(f" Description: {result['description'][:150]}...") if interim_results: print(f"\n🔄 INTERIM/ACTING MANAGER RESULTS:") for i, result in enumerate(interim_results[:3], 1): print(f"\n{i}. {result['title']}") print(f" Query: {result['query_text']}") print(f" Description: {result['description'][:150]}...") if tigers_related_results: print(f"\n🐅 DETROIT TIGERS RELATED RESULTS:") for i, result in enumerate(tigers_related_results[:3], 1): print(f"\n{i}. {result['title']}") print(f" Description: {result['description'][:150]}...") # Create analysis summary analysis_file = f'workspace/mlb_july_2010_analysis_summary_{timestamp}.txt' with open(analysis_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: f.write("MLB JULY 2010 MANAGERIAL CHANGES - COMPREHENSIVE SEARCH ANALYSIS\n") f.write("=" * 65 + "\n\n") f.write(f"Analysis Date: {datetime.now().strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')}\n") f.write(f"Total Search Queries: {search_summary['total_queries']}\n") f.write(f"Successful Searches: {search_summary['successful_searches']}\n") f.write(f"Failed Searches: {search_summary['failed_searches']}\n") f.write(f"Total Search Results: {search_summary['total_results']}\n\n") f.write("SEARCH OBJECTIVES STATUS:\n") f.write("-" * 25 + "\n") f.write(f"1. July 2010 MLB managerial changes: {len(july_2010_results)} relevant results\n") f.write(f"2. Manager dismissals/appointments: {len(manager_change_results)} relevant results\n") f.write(f"3. Interim/Acting appointments: {len(interim_results)} relevant results\n") f.write(f"4. Detroit Tigers connections: {len(tigers_related_results)} relevant results\n\n") if july_2010_results: f.write("TOP JULY 2010 FINDINGS:\n") f.write("-" * 25 + "\n") for i, result in enumerate(july_2010_results[:5], 1): f.write(f"{i}. {result['title']}\n") f.write(f" Query: {result['query_text']}\n") f.write(f" Link: {result['link']}\n\n") if interim_results: f.write("INTERIM/ACTING MANAGER FINDINGS:\n") f.write("-" * 35 + "\n") for i, result in enumerate(interim_results[:3], 1): f.write(f"{i}. {result['title']}\n") f.write(f" Description: {result['description'][:100]}...\n\n") print(f"\n📁 Analysis complete. Files saved:") print(f"Search results: {results_file}") print(f"Analysis summary: {analysis_file}") print(f"\n🎯 PRELIMINARY ASSESSMENT:") print(f"=" * 30) if search_summary['successful_searches'] > 0: print(f"✅ Successfully completed {search_summary['successful_searches']} out of {search_summary['total_queries']} searches") print(f"📊 Collected {search_summary['total_results']} total search results") if july_2010_results: print(f"🎯 Found {len(july_2010_results)} results specifically mentioning July 2010") if interim_results: print(f"🔄 Found {len(interim_results)} results about interim/acting managers") if tigers_related_results: print(f"🐅 Found {len(tigers_related_results)} results related to Detroit Tigers") print(f"\n📋 Next step: Detailed analysis of results to identify specific managerial changes") else: print(f"❌ No successful searches completed - may need alternative search approach") print(f"\n🏁 Comprehensive search phase complete - ready for detailed analysis!")
